Detailed Description

template<typename Actions>
struct dvbcodec::Section< Actions >

DVB Section grammar defined using Boost Spirit.

References:

  • ISO/IEC 13818-1, MPEG-2 Transport Stream
  • http://www.boost.org, Boost

Users of this grammar need to provide a suitable "Actions" class to implement the various semantic actions.
